Home.description: Only the sender and recipient know who received funds

Tutorial.receive-first: Use the Setup page to configure your account
Tutorial.receive-second: Ask someone to send funds to your address, ENS, or CNS name through the Umbra app
Tutorial.receive-third: Check the Receive page to withdraw funds
Tutorial.send-first: Get the address, ENS, or CNS name of the person you're sending funds to
Tutorial.send-second: Complete the form on the Send page

Home-action-card.setup-description: Setup your account to receive funds

Base-Layout.advanced-mode-description: Enables advanced features such as private key export, additional recipient ID options, and event scanning settings.
